subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jay Bruce’s three-run homer off Jon Niese in the first inning set the tone in Cincinnati’s victory against the Mets, who were 2 for 12 with runners in scoring position on Saturday.
snippet: Jay Bruce’s three-run homer off Jon Niese in the first inning set the tone in Cincinnati’s victory against the Mets, who were 2 for 12 with runners in scoring position on Saturday.
